tag_list: database-architecture, mysql, linux, consulting, ec2-migration, scalability
overview:
Sean Hull is founder and Senior Consultant at Heavyweight Internet Group, a database architecture specialist and internet business consultancy.

Sean has had more than 20 years of experience in advising and helping companies improve and optimize their database architecture, and ultimately, to help them become more agile organizations.

His expertise lie in the area of MySQL, Linux, EC2, and other open source technologies. He has extensive experience working with startups and Fortune 500 companies, in database migration, disaster recovery, web optimization and tuning, and mapping out strategies for rapid scalability.

Sean has strong inter-personal and communication skills which makes it easy for him to work with different personality types. He is also valued for his ability to take a broad view of things and to prescribe effective strategies to meet objectives.
